snippet: The Foreign Ministry warned citizens wanted by the United States not to visit nations that have an extradition treaty with it, citing recent arrests.
abstract: Russian Foreign Ministry cautions citizens wanted by the United States not to visit nations that have an extradition treaty with the US.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry warned citizens wanted by the United States not to visit nations that have an extradition treaty with it, citing recent arrests.

headline.main: Russia Issues Travel Warning to Its Citizens About United States and Extradition
headline.print_headline: Russia Issues Travel Warning to Its Citizens About United States and Extradition
